content:
AssemblyIdentity.FullNameFlags Enum

Definition

This class represents the attributes that the crosoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.GetFullName* function returns.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum AssemblyIdentity.FullNameFlags
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
AssemblyIdentity.FullNameFlags

Fields

All

Include all attributes.
Default

Include the Name, Version, Culture, and PublicKeyToken attributes.
ProcessorArchitecture

Include the Name, Version, Culture, PublicKeyToken, and ProcessorArchitecture attributes.
Type

Include the Name, Version, Culture, PublicKeyToken, and Type attributes.
